description.p: Returns the arc sine of an angle expressed in radians.
A numeric field or value between -1 and 1.
Returns the arc sine of the angle.

discussion.p: The Asin function returns the arc sine of an angle specified as Radians.

example.caption: Asin() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 asin(-0.8) AS EXPR1 FROM Products = -0.927295218001612
